00043         UCertificate(X509* px509 = 0) : x509(px509)
00044                 {
00045                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCertificate, "%p", px509)
00046                 }

00056         static X509* readX509(const UString& x, const char* format = 0);
00057 
00058         UCertificate(const UString& x, const char* format = 0)
00059                 {
00060                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCertificate, "%.*S,%S", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(x), format)
00061 
00062                 x509 = readX509(x, format);
00063                 }
00064 
00069         void clear()
00070                 {
00071                 U_TRACE(0, "UCertificate::clear()")
00072 
00073                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(x509)
00074 
00075                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(X509_free, "%p", x509);
00076 
00077                 x509 = 0;
00078                 }
00079 
00080         ~UCertificate()
00081                 {
00082                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCertificate)
00083 
00084                 if (x509) clear();
00085                 }

00089         bool isValid() const
00090                 {
00091                 U_TRACE(0, "UCertificate::isValid()")
00092 
00093                 U_RETURN(x509 != 0);
00094                 }
00095 
00096         bool isSelfSigned() const;
00097 
00098         void set(X509* px509)
00099                 {
00100                 U_TRACE(0, "UCertificate::set(%p)", px509)
00101 
00102                 if (isValid()) clear();
00103 
00104                 if (x509) x509 = X509_dup(px509);
00105                 }
00106 
00111         void duplicate()
00112                 {
00113                 U_TRACE(0, "UCertificate::duplicate()")
00114 
00115                 x509 = X509_dup(x509);
00116                 }

00127                 {

00131 
00132                 long hash = U_SYSCALL(X509_subject_name_hash, "%p", x509);

00134                 return getFileName(hash);

00153         static UString getIssuer(X509* x509, bool ldap = false)
00154                 {
00155                 U_TRACE(1, "UCertificate::getIssuer(%p,%b)", x509, ldap)
00156 
00157                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(x509)
00158 
00159                 X509_NAME* n = (X509_NAME*) U_SYSCALL(X509_get_issuer_name, "%p", x509);
00160 
00161                 return getName(n, ldap);
00162                 }

00252 
00253                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(a)
00254 
00255                 UString signature( (const char*) a->signature->data,
00256                                                                                                         a->signature->length );

00292         static EVP_PKEY* getSubjectPublicKey(X509* a)
00293                 {
00294                 U_TRACE(1, "UCertificate::getSubjectPublicKey(%p)", a)
00295 
00296                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(a)
00297 
00298                 EVP_PKEY* evp = (EVP_PKEY*) U_SYSCALL(X509_get_pubkey, "%p", a);

00300                 U_RETURN_POINTER(evp, EVP_PKEY);

00309         static bool matchPrivateKey(X509* a, EVP_PKEY* privateKey)
00310                 {
00311                 U_TRACE(1, "UCertificate::matchPrivateKey(%p,%p)", a, privateKey)
00312 
00313                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(a)
00314 
00315                 EVP_PKEY* publicKey = (EVP_PKEY*) U_SYSCALL(X509_get_pubkey, "%p", a);
00316 
00317                 bool result = (U_SYSCALL(EVP_PKEY_cmp, "%p,%p", publicKey, privateKey) == 1);
00318 
00319                 U_RETURN(result);
00320                 }
00321 
00322         bool matchPrivateKey(EVP_PKEY* privateKey) const { return matchPrivateKey(x509, privateKey); }
00323

00329                 {
00330                 U_TRACE(0, "UCertificate::getNotBefore()")
00331 
00332                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(x509)
00333 
00334                 ASN1_UTCTIME* utctime = X509_get_notBefore(x509);
00335 
00336                 U_RETURN((const char*)utctime->data);
00337                 }

00347                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(x509)

00351                 U_RETURN((const char*)utctime->data);

00358         bool checkValidity() const
00359                 {
00360                 U_TRACE(1, "UCertificate::checkValidity()")
00361 
00362                 (void) U_SYSCALL(gettimeofday, "%p,%p", &u_now, 0);
00363 
00364                 bool result = checkValidity(u_now.tv_sec);
00365 
00366                 U_RETURN(result);
00367                 }
00368 
00373         bool checkValidity(time_t time) const
00374                 {
00375                 U_TRACE(0, "UCertificate::checkValidity(%ld)", time)
00376 
00377                 /*
00378                 Not Before: Jan 25 11:54:00 2005 GMT                                                                                         
00379                 Not After : Jan 25 11:54:00 2006 GMT                                                                                         
00380                 */
00381 
00382                 bool result = (time >= UDate::getSecondFromTime(getNotBefore(), true, "%s %2d %2d:%2d:%2d %4d GMT") &&
00383                                                         time <= UDate::getSecondFromTime(getNotAfter(),  true, "%s %2d %2d:%2d:%2d %4d GMT"));
00384 
00385                 U_RETURN(result);
00386                 }

00431         static void setForLog(X509* a, UString& buffer, const char* fmt = " (\"%.*s\",\"%ld\")")
00432                 {
00433                 U_TRACE(0, "UCertificate::setForLog(%p,%p,%S)", a, &buffer, fmt)
00434 
00435                 UString issuer = getIssuer(a, true);
00436 
00437                 buffer.snprintf_add(fmt, U_STRING_TO_TRACE(issuer), getSerialNumber(a));
00438                 }
00439 
00440         void setForLog(UString& buffer, const char* fmt = " (\"%.*s\",\"%ld\")") const { setForLog(x509, buffer, fmt); }

00444         static bool isEqual(X509* a, X509* b)
00445                 {
00446                 U_TRACE(0, "UCertificate::isEqual(%p,%p)", a, b)
00447 
00448                 int rc = U_SYSCALL(X509_cmp, "%p,%p", a, b);
00449 
00450                 U_RETURN(rc == 0);
00451                 }
00452 
00453         bool operator==(const UCertificate& c) const { return  isEqual(x509, c.x509); }
00454         bool operator!=(const UCertificate& c) const { return !isEqual(x509, c.x509); }
